products.name: Fusion Allergy Nasal Spray
description: Fusion allergy nasal spray provides quick relief from nasal allergy symptoms.
Effective for sneezing, runny nose, and nasal congestion.
directions: Use 1-2 sprays in each nostril once or twice daily.
warnings: Do not use if you have a nasal infection.
Consult your doctor before use if you have any pre-existing conditions.

products.name: Allevia 120mg Tablets
description: Allevia 120mg tablets are used to relieve symptoms of seasonal allergies.
Effective for sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes.
directions: Take one tablet daily with or without food.
warnings: May cause drowsiness in some individuals.
Consult your doctor before use if pregnant or breastfeeding.

products.name: Piriteze Allergy Tablets
description: Piriteze allergy tablets offer effective relief from hay fever and other allergic conditions.
Reduces symptoms like sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes.
directions: Take one tablet daily, preferably in the evening.
warnings: Avoid alcohol while taking this medication.

products.name: TreatHay 120mg Tablets
description: TreatHay 120mg fexofenadine hydrochloride tablets provide relief from allergic rhinitis and chronic urticaria.
Helps alleviate sneezing, runny nose, and itching.
directions: Take one tablet daily with water.
warnings: Do not use if you have kidney problems.
Consult your doctor if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

products.name: Vicks VapoRub
description: Vicks VapoRub provides relief from cough and muscular pain.
Contains menthol and eucalyptus oil for soothing action.
directions: Apply to the chest and throat or sore muscles as needed.
warnings: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.

products.name: Paracetamol 500mg Tablets
description: Paracetamol 500mg tablets are used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.
Commonly used for headaches, muscle aches, and minor arthritis pain.
directions: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 8 tablets in 24 hours.
warnings: Do not exceed the recommended dose.
Consult a doctor if you have liver or kidney disease.

products.name: Dolo 650mg Tablets
description: Dolo 650mg tablets provide relief from fever and pain.
Effective for headaches, back pain, and muscle pain.
directions: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 8 tablets in 24 hours.
warnings: Consult your doctor before use if you have liver problems.
Keep out of reach of children.

products.name: Volini Pain Relief Spray
description: Volini pain relief spray offers quick relief from pain and inflammation.
Suitable for use on sore muscles, joints, and back pain.
directions: Spray onto the affected area 2-3 times a day.
warnings: Avoid contact with eyes and broken skin.
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.
